function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of subgroup analysis for SES groups in relation to greenspace and health outcomes","Impact":"Inability to understand the specific impact of greenspace on health inequalities among different SES groups","Mitigation":"Conduct further research or studies to specifically analyze the impact of greenspace on health outcomes for different SES groups","Technologies":"Research methodologies and statistical analysis tools","People":"Individuals from different SES groups","Owner":"Research institutions and organizations"},{"Description":"Poor methodological quality and heterogeneity of outcome measures in previous systematic reviews","Impact":"Difficulty in interpreting and extrapolating findings related to the association between greenspace and health outcomes","Mitigation":"Improve the methodological quality of future systematic reviews and standardize outcome measures","Technologies":"Improved research methodologies and standardized measurement tools","People":"Researchers, systematic review authors","Owner":"Research institutions and organizations"},{"Description":"Inconsistent and mixed findings in relation to the association between greenspace and health outcomes","Impact":"Uncertainty in the true impact of greenspace on health outcomes","Mitigation":"Conduct additional research to validate the relationship between greenspace and specific health outcomes","Technologies":"Statistical analysis tools, longitudinal studies","People":"Researchers, policymakers, practitioners","Owner":"Research institutions and organizations"}]}
